characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Fabrisan was a logicmaster who proposed a conundrum, which is named for him. Fabrisan's Conundrum was solved by Taravangian on one of his days of genius.
Shallan stated to Jasnah that if she (Jasnah) expected her (Shallan) to be able to solve the Conundrum with a wave of her hand, she'd be disappointed.
